name: Unfollowers
description: A rustic app to check new followers and unfollowers

CONSUMER_KEY.description: The consumer key provided by Twitter

CONSUMER_SECRET.description: The consumer secret provided by Twitter

ACCESS_TOKEN_KEY.description: The access token key provided by Twitter

ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: The access token secret provided by Twitter

SCREEN_NAME.description: The screen name of the interested person

DB_HOST.description: The host uri of the DB
